stateDiagram

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

OFF

OFF : OFF

OFF : enter / #123; light_off()#59; #125;

state ON_GROUP {

        ON1

        ON1 : ON1

        ON1 : enter / #123; light_1()#59; #125;

        ON2

        ON2 : ON2

        ON2 : enter / #123; light_2()#59; #125;

        ON3

        ON3 : ON3

        ON3 : enter / #123; light_3()#59; #125;

}

ROOT.(InitialState) --> OFF

OFF --> ON1 : INC

ON_GROUP --> OFF : DIM_LONG

ON_GROUP --> ON3 : INC_LONG

ON1 --> ON2 : INC

ON1 --> OFF : DIM

ON2 --> ON1 : DIM

ON2 --> ON3 : INC

ON3 --> ON2 : DIM
Events
settings
